title: Report: Toyota Still Considering Smaller Unibody Truck for US
description: Small trucks have had a bumpy history in the States. However, lately, some automakers have found success with smaller-than-usual offerings, including Ford’s Maverick and Hyundai’s Santa Cruz, both of which are small pickups. The small truck segment could grow even more with the Bezos-backed Slate ...
titleSummary: Toyota Hints at Launching Compact Pickup in American Market
descriptionSummary: In recent years, American consumers have shown a surprising appetite for compact pickup trucks, as evidenced by the success of models like Ford's Maverick and Hyundai's Santa Cruz. Now, another contender is poised to enter the market.

title: One-of-25 Prodrive P25 Subaru Impreza for sale
description: When the Prodrive P25 debuted in 2022, its combination of iconic World Rally Championship (WRC) looks and up-to-date mechanical upgrades ensured that it sold out quickly even with a price tag of about $500,000. But now there's an opportunity to own one of these resto-modded Subaru Imprezas, albeit ...
titleSummary: "Rare Gem: 1 of 25 Ultra-Rare P25 Subaru Imprezas Hits the Market"
descriptionSummary: The Prodrive P25, a luxurious reimagining of the iconic Subaru Impreza, sparked intense interest in 2022 due to its striking WRC design and high-performance capabilities, despite its hefty price tag. Now, rare opportunities have arisen for would-be owners.

title: Vince McMahon Crashes Bentley Continental GT Speed Into BMW, Cited for Reckless Driving
description: According to police, McMahon was behind the wheel of a 2024 Bentley Continental GT Speed on July 24 when he collided with a BMW 430 on the Merritt Parkway in Westport, Connecticut. State troopers claim they were trying to stop McMahon for speeding when he rear-ended the BMW at reportedly 80–90 ...
titleSummary: "Billionaire Boss Behind the Wheel in High-Profile Crash Caught on Camera"
descriptionSummary: On July 24, a high-speed collision occurred on the Merritt Parkway in Westport, Connecticut, involving a Bentley Continental GT Speed and a BMW 430. Police say the driver, McMahon, was attempting to flee a traffic stop when he struck the other vehicle.

title: 2019 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 3ZR For Sale With Just 2,290 Miles
description: While the C8 Corvette may be making headlines as the record-setting, supercar-killing, mid-engined American monster that it is, the C7 Corvette still holds a special place in enthusiasts' hearts. The C7 was likely the last front-engined Corvette, a formula that carried the nameplate for seven ...
titleSummary: "Low-Mileage Beast: 2019 Corvette ZR1 Lists with Barely Ticked Over 2,200 Miles"
descriptionSummary: For die-hard Corvette fans, the C7 will always be remembered as the final hurrah of the iconic front-engine design that defined the breed for decades, preceding the revolutionary mid-engined C8.

title: Automakers Bet on Performance EVs to Revive Slowing Demand
description: The new Lyriq-V is the fastest Cadillac ever. It’s also the first all-electric member of Caddy’s high-performance V-Series – though it won’t be the last, with the Optiq-V soon to follow. The General Motors luxury brand is just the latest in a growing list of automakers rolling out high-performance ...
titleSummary: Car Makers Pin Hopes on High-Performance Electric Models to Boost Flagging Sales
descriptionSummary: Cadillac has unleashed its most potent model yet: the Lyriq-V, an all-electric powerhouse that catapults the V-Series into new territory. Next up, the Optiq-V promises to further elevate the luxury brand's performance credentials.

title: This Is What Toyota's Answer to the Ford Maverick Might Look Like
description: The world’s largest carmaker is preparing to jump into the compact pickup market. The small lifestyle pickup will take on the Ford Maverick and Hyundai Santa Cruz, with a potential launch window in 2026 or 2027. And unlike the Hilux, this one’s not being built to pull tree stumps out of bogs — it’s ...
titleSummary: Toyota Unveils Compact Pickup Challenger to Ford Maverick Dominance
descriptionSummary: The global leader in automotive manufacturing is poised to enter the growing compact pickup segment, targeting enthusiasts and everyday drivers with a versatile new model set to debut sometime between 2026 and 2027.

title: This Rendering Imagines a Modern Version of Classic Porsche 911s
description: The Porsche 911 is an iconic sports car, but part of that legacy is due to the fact that, in 2025, it still looks strikingly similar to the first 911s from the early 1960s. That said, today’s cars are far larger and heavier than they once were, but a Ukrainian designer’s recent Instagram renderings ...
titleSummary: "Visionary Design Breathes New Life into Timeless Iconic Sportscar Legacy"
descriptionSummary: The Porsche 911's enduring iconic status can be attributed in part to its remarkably consistent design language since the 1960s. Yet, despite its timeless look, modern models have grown significantly larger and heavier. Recent digital artistry has explored this intriguing contrast.

title: You'll Want To Grab A New Mercedes-Benz EV ASAP
description: If you want a new Mercedes-Benz EQ electric vehicle, you’ll have to settle for what’s on the lot – for now. Mercedes has temporarily suspended new orders for its battery electric EQS and EQE sedan and utility vehicles, citing "current market conditions" as the reason for the decision, according to ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes-Benz Electric Car Arrives with Must-Have Features and Unbeatable Performance"
descriptionSummary: Due to current market fluctuations, Mercedes-Benz has put a hold on taking new orders for its EQ electric vehicle lineup, including sedans and utilities, until existing inventory is depleted.

title: Leaked Prelude Pricing: Too Pricey for Its Own Good?
description: The Honda Prelude is making a comeback. On paper, it has all the right ingredients for a frugal sports coupe: sleek styling, a hybrid powertrain, and a nameplate that still resonates with enthusiasts. But according to a leak from Japanese outlet Creative Trend, it might arrive with a price tag that ...
titleSummary: Pricing Blunder Uncovered: Is This Gaming Console Already Losing Ground?
descriptionSummary: The Honda Prelude is staging a revival, boasting a winning combination of stylish looks, eco-friendly hybrid tech, and a nostalgic charm that's sure to delight driving enthusiasts. However, insiders hint at a potentially pricey return for the iconic coupe.

title: Here’s What’s Behind “Model T Moment” Ford Will Reveal Aug. 11
description: You’ll normally find Ford CEO Jim Farley driving around in one of his company’s pickups or SUVs, but he’s spent a lot of time in recent months behind the wheel of a Xiaomi SU7 battery-electric vehicle. Like most senior industry officials, Farley is well aware of the threat being posed by a flood of ...
titleSummary: "Ford to Unveil Its Next Game-Changing Innovation August 11"
descriptionSummary: Ford CEO Jim Farley has been getting familiar with more than just his company's lineup, recently clocking miles in a Xiaomi SU7 electric car as part of his efforts to stay ahead of emerging competitors in the rapidly changing automotive landscape.

title: Mazda Drops Impressive 2025 CX-90 Lease Deals For August
description: Looking for a well-equipped, comfortable, sporty full-size SUV that’s also affordable? Look no further than the Mazda CX-90. The three-row SUV is a head-turner with plenty of power behind its all-wheel drive drivetrain. The spacious interior and comfortable ride extend throughout - even your ...
titleSummary: "Leasing Sweet Spots: Mazda Unveils Competitive 2025 CX-90 Promotions in August"
descriptionSummary: Discover a sporty yet practical full-size SUV that checks all the boxes: ample space, impressive performance, and an affordable price point. Meet the Mazda CX-90, a stylish and feature-rich vehicle designed for comfort and adventure.

title: 2026 Porsche 911 Turbo Debuts This Year With A Hybrid For The First Time
description: In 1974, attendees at the Paris Motor Show bore witness to the debut of the first-ever turbocharged Porsche 911, arriving a year after the 911 RSR Turbo concept race car. After capping an incredible era with the special-edition 911 Turbo 50 Years at Monterey Car Week last year, we're in an era of ...
titleSummary: "Turbocharged Evolution: Porsche 911 Goes Electric for a High-Octane Makeover in 2026"
descriptionSummary: In a groundbreaking 1974 Paris Motor Show reveal, Porsche unveiled its first turbocharged 911, building on the pioneering spirit that began with the 911 RSR Turbo concept just twelve months prior. Now, a new chapter unfolds.

title: One SoCal Fisker Dealer is Still In Business and Has Inventory
description: Fisker filed for bankruptcy last year and subsequently shut down, leaving owners with no parts, repair support, or warranty coverage. The company’s only model, the Ocean, saw heavy discounts as it attempted to recoup some of its sunk costs, but one Southern California dealership has more inventory ...
titleSummary: SoCal's Lone Fisker Franchise Rolls On with Cars in Stock
descriptionSummary: Fisker's abrupt shutdown after bankruptcy left customers in limbo, without access to spare parts, repair services, or warranty claims. The company's sole model, the Ocean, was heavily discounted as it struggled to recoup losses.

title: 2026 Hyundai Palisade Vs. 2026 Hyundai Santa Fe: 5 Major Differences
description: In the space of just a year or two, Hyundai has two fresh-faced, three-row, gas-powered crossovers on sale. The Santa Fe was completely revised as of the 2024 model year, and the 2026 Santa Fe recently debuted. These SUVs have a large pricing overlap, so it can be tricky for Hyundai fans to decide ...
titleSummary: "Palisade vs. Santa Fe: Hyundai's Twin Titans Face Off in Key Showdown"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai has rapidly expanded its crossover lineup with two new three-row, gas-powered models: the revamped 2024 Santa Fe and its sleek 2026 sibling. The models' overlapping price tags make choosing between them a challenging decision.

title: This V10-Powered E46 M3 Blends The Best Of The Best M Cars
description: While browsing Instagram last night, I came across a post advertising a highly unusual E46 BMW M3 that was dividing opinions. The car in question is a 2004 model with 185,000 miles on the clock, yet it's got a six-figure asking price. Why? Because, among other things, it has the V10 engine from an ...
titleSummary: E46 M3 Showcases Ultimate Combination of High-Performance and Classic Design Heritage
descriptionSummary: A peculiar BMW M3 surfaced online, generating intense debate on Instagram. This 2004 E46 model boasts an astonishing 185,000 miles but commands a hefty six-figure sum due to its unique V10 powerplant.

title: Subaru Hikes Impreza Prices for 2026—Should You Wait or Buy The 2025 Instead?
description: The Subaru Impreza has long been the most accessible entry point into Subaru's all-wheel-drive lineup. After a full redesign in 2024 that consolidated the body style into a five-door hatchback and introduced a new RS trim with a larger engine, the model saw minimal changes for 2025. That trend ...
titleSummary: "Subaru Jumps Price on 2026 Impreza – Is a Waiting Game Worth It?"
descriptionSummary: The Subaru Impreza has been the gateway to all-wheel-drive capability since its introduction. Following a comprehensive redesign in 2024, the 2025 model builds on that foundation with few notable updates, maintaining its status as an approachable entry point into Subaru's lineup.

title: The New Hyundai Elexio Offers More Than Expected for A Reasonable Price
description: Like every other automaker, Hyundai recognizes that China is an important market. Claiming the vehicle as “a new starting point,” the company recently revealed the electric Elexio SUV, which has shown impressive capabilities in early safety testing. Hyundai acknowledged that China is a “must-fight ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Hidden Gem Delivers Surprising Value at an Affordable Price Point"
descriptionSummary: Hyundai's foray into the Chinese market marks a significant milestone for the brand. The unveiling of its electric Elexio SUV highlights the company's commitment to innovation and safety, with promising results from initial testing phases.

title: New Car Shoppers Are Sacrificing These Features to Save Money
description: Automakers continue to add flashy and expensive features to their new vehicles. The expectation is that panoramic glass roofs, reconfigurable digital gauge clusters, or head-up displays are in high demand among consumers. However, AutoPacific’s “Future Attribute Demand Study,” which surveyed ...
titleSummary: "Cutbacks on Wheels: Budget-Conscious Buyers Prioritize Affordability Over Luxury Perks"
descriptionSummary: Automakers are loading up new cars with premium amenities like expansive sunroofs and customizable dashboards, but do these features truly resonate with buyers? A recent survey sheds light on what drivers really want from their vehicles.

title: Nissan's New Armada NISMO Adds More Power and Swagger to the Brutish SUV
description: The Nissan Armada, known globally as the Nissan Patrol, has long been celebrated for its rugged capability and utilitarian strength. Much like the Toyota Land Cruiser and Sequoia, it has evolved over time, adapting to changing demands while maintaining its core identity. For 2026, the all-new ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's Fierce Armada NISMO Packs a Punch with Unbridled Muscle"
descriptionSummary: The Nissan Armada, a stalwart of rugged reliability, has built a reputation on versatility and unyielding durability. Like several other iconic SUVs, it has balanced evolution with tradition, meeting shifting expectations without sacrificing its fundamental character. Now, an all-new model arrives for 2026.

title: Battle of the 2025 Chevrolet Blazer: Gas Versus Electric
description: We’ve seen a couple of automakers sharing nameplates across gas and electric vehicles now, with the Chevrolet Blazer and Blazer EV serving as a shining example. While sharing a nameplate helps in name recognition, it can also be confusing, especially if you’re not a car person. Both the Chevy ...
titleSummary: "Chevrolet Blazer Showdown: Fossil Fuels Face Off Against Eco-Friendly Rival"
descriptionSummary: As hybrid models become more common, some automakers are adopting a shared naming strategy across their gas-guzzling and electric lineup, a trend exemplified by the Chevrolet Blazer's dual identities. This approach presents both benefits and drawbacks for consumers.

title: The Forgotten Ferraris: 5 Models That Deserve More Love
description: When you think of Ferrari, chances are your mind jumps straight to icons like the F40, 250 GTO, LaFerrari, or even more modern fare like the SF90 Stradale, the 296GTB, and the new F80. While not all of the modern Ferraris are as iconic as the ones of old, they’re still worthy road and track ...
titleSummary: "Unsung Heroes of the Road: Five Ferrari Gems Worth Rediscovering"
descriptionSummary: The Ferrari brand is often synonymous with legendary models like the F40 and 250 GTO, but its more contemporary creations - such as the SF90 Stradale and 296GTB - also merit serious consideration.

title: How did Cadillac Make the 2026 Lyriq Fit in the "V" Family?
description: The Cadillac Lyriq’s formula is almost perfect. It’s fast, nimble, tech-forward, stylish, and incredibly easy to become acquainted with. With a price range of $60,090 to $72,490, it may seem like a lot, but it comes with 365 horsepower in the single-motor RWD setup and 515 horsepower in the ...
titleSummary: Cadillac Tries to Prove Electric Luxury Can Wear a Prestigious Badge.
descriptionSummary: The Cadillac Lyriq strikes a remarkable balance between performance, innovation, and refinement. Its potent engine options, sleek design, and user-friendly tech features make it an appealing choice for those willing to invest in luxury, with prices starting at $60,090.

title: Ford CEO Says Its Newest EVs Are Ready for Its “Model T Moment”
description: During Ford's second-quarter earnings call with investors on the evening of July 30, Ford CEO Jim Farley revealed that the automaker is set to reveal its new strategy centered around a new line of electric vehicles underpinned by a new platform. In his remarks, Farley said that the future plans ...
titleSummary: Ford Awaits Its Electric Awakening, As New Models Spark Hopes for a Mass Market Breakthrough
descriptionSummary: During Ford's quarterly earnings update, CEO Jim Farley hinted at an upcoming shift in focus: a comprehensive strategy built around a cutting-edge lineup of electric vehicles, with a shared architecture at its core.

title: Hyundai Offers Killer 2026 Santa Fe Lease Deal for August
description: The 2026 Hyundai Santa Fe looks like the South Korean brand took a 2016 Land Rover LR4 and created its own, fresher, and more attractive version. Fully redesigned last year, the Santa Fe departs completely from its sleeker predecessor in favor of a more upright and boxy look. With sharply defined ...
titleSummary: "Steal of the Summer: Hyundai Drops Jaw-Dropping Santa Fe Lease Price"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 Hyundai Santa Fe embodies a bold new identity, shedding its sleek predecessor for a chunkier, more rugged design that diverges significantly from the curves of its predecessors.

title: Federal jury finds Tesla partly liable for fatal Autopilot crash
description: A jury in Miami has determined that Tesla should be held partly liable for a fatal 2019 crash involving the automaker's "Autopilot" driver-assist system, and is requiring Tesla to pay $329 million in damages to the family of the deceased and an injured survivor, multiple news outlets reported ...
titleSummary: "Tesla's Self-Drive Tech Blamed in Deadly Crash Verdict Shocks Industry and Investors"
descriptionSummary: A Miami jury has ruled that Tesla bears responsibility for a devastating 2019 car crash, which claimed one life and left another seriously injured. The company will owe nearly $330 million in compensation.

title: Ferrari shares dip 12% in biggest decline since 2016 listing
description: Ferrari shares fell more than 12% on Thursday, the biggest single-day drop since the automaker was first publicly listed on stock exchanges in New York and Milan in 2016, Reuters reports. Yet unlike some automakers, Ferrari is maintaining its financial guidance amid uncertainty over the Trump ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari Stock Sinks to Two-Year Low in Sharpest Decline Yet"
descriptionSummary: Ferrari's shares plummeted nearly 12% on Thursday, marking the largest one-day decline since its IPO in 2016. Despite market volatility, the luxury carmaker has reaffirmed its financial projections despite ongoing uncertainty surrounding global trade policies.

title: Kia’s Carnival, Sportage, And Telluride Set New Sales Records In July
description: Kia’s positive sales momentum continued into the second half of 2025, with the manufacturer reporting a 12% increase in year-on-year sales in July. Together with Hyundai, the Korean brands had a stellar end to the second quarter, while Kia’s sedans are seeing sales growth that’s outpacing its SUVs. ...
titleSummary: Kia's SUV Trio Shatters Sales Marks in Record-Breaking July Performance
descriptionSummary: Kia's upward trend shows no signs of slowing down, with July 2025 sales marking a 12% boost over last year. The Korean brand's sedan sales are outshining its SUVs, driving a successful second quarter alongside Hyundai.

title: Porsche's New Combustion Crossover Will Arrive Within Three Years
description: Despite achieving record sales in the U.S. earlier this year, Porsche is struggling in certain respects. Sales in China are falling as far cheaper locally produced luxury EVs with more power continue to eat into sales, and with tariffs taking another bite out of the bottom line, forcing Porsche to ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Revs Up Electric-Free Lineup with Fuel-Powered Hybrid SUV Coming 2025"
descriptionSummary: Porsche's success story in the US market has been tempered by struggles elsewhere. In China, the company is facing a decline in sales as more affordable local electric vehicles gain traction, while tariffs are further eroding profits.

title: Aston Martin May Sell Stake in Formula 1 Racing Team and Go Private in Turnaround Efforts
description: Despite coming up with some compelling vehicles in recent years, Aston Martin has continued to struggle financially, leading it to some tough decisions as it plots a path forward. Among other efforts, the storied British automaker reportedly plans to sell its stake in its Formula 1 racing team, and ...
titleSummary: Aston Martin to Ditch Public Face as Part of High-Stakes Formula One Revamp Plan
descriptionSummary: Aston Martin's financial struggles have led to a critical reassessment of its priorities, with key moves underway to secure the company's future. This includes potentially divesting from its high-profile Formula 1 racing partnership.

title: Jaguar Land Rover CEO Adrian Mardell steps down
description: Jaguar Land Rover CEO Adrian Mardell is stepping down after 35 years at the automaker, including the last three as CEO. Mardell's tenure brought increased profits to JLR, and he started a major restructuring of the automaker's brands and model lineups that's still underway. "Adrian Mardell has ...
titleSummary: "Jaguar Land Rover Leader Steps Down Amid Leadership Shake-Up"
descriptionSummary: After a storied 35-year career with Jaguar Land Rover, including three years as CEO, Adrian Mardell is handing over the reins to a new leader. His legacy includes driving profits upward and launching a transformative brand overhaul.
